Reservation.title: Reservation
Reservation.description: A booking for a parking slot.

userId.description: The ID of the user who made the reservation.

slotId.description: The ID of the parking slot.

vehiclePlate.description: The vehicle plate number for the reservation.

startTime.description: The start time of the reservation.

endTime.description: The end time of the reservation.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the reservation was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the reservation was last updated.
